CustomField.description: Used as merge fields in email template
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Account.IsPersonAccount, text(Account.Salutation)<>"" ), CASE(text(Account.Salutation), "Mr.", "尊敬的" + Account.LastName + "先生，", "Mrs.", "尊敬的" + Account.LastName + "女士，", "Ms.", "尊敬的" + Account.LastName + "女士，", ""), "您好" + " " + Account.FirstName + " " + Account.LastName )
CustomField.label: Salutation Email CN
